format.full-description: This ASCAT SZR_1B description was generated using the ASCAT PFS Excel document Issue 6 Revision 4+ (eps_ascatl1_6.4+_names_masks.xls) and pfs2xml version 3.3

field.name: PRODUCT_NAME
field.description: Complete name of the product

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_1
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_2
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_3
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: PARENT_PRODUCT_NAME_4
field.description: Name of the parent product from which this product has been produced. For Level 0 products or products for which this is not appropriate, this field is filled with lower case x's.

field.name: INSTRUMENT_ID
field.description: Instrument identification

item.name: All NOAA
item.description: instruments specific to Level 0 NOAA product

field.name: INSTRUMENT_MODEL
field.description: Instrument Model identification

field.name: PRODUCT_TYPE
field.description: Product Type

item.description: NOAC Global Area Coverage AVHRR data
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at full resolution
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at operational resolution (50 km)
ASCAT calibrated s0 data at research resolution (25 km)

field.name: PROCESSING_LEVEL
field.description: Processing Level Identification

field.name: SPACECRAFT_ID
field.description: Spacecraft identification

field.name: SENSING_START
field.description: UTC Time of start of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_END
field.description: UTC Time of end of sensing data in this object (PDU, ROI or Full Product)

field.name: SENSING_START_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of start of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted start time at the MPF level.

field.name: SENSING_END_THEORETICAL
field.description: Theoretical UTC Time of end of sensing data in the dump from which this object is derived. This data is the predicted end time at the MPF level.

field.name: PROCESSING_CENTRE
field.description: Processing Centre Identification

item.description: First EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Second EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment
Third EUMETSAT EPS Core Ground Segment

field.name: PROCESSOR_MAJOR_VERSION
field.description: Processing chain major version number

field.name: PROCESSOR_MINOR_VERSION
field.description: Processing chain minor version number

field.name: FORMAT_MAJOR_VERSION
field.description: Dataset Format Major Version number

field.name: FORMAT_MINOR_VERSION
field.description: Dataset Format Minor Version number

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the processing at start of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the processing at end of processing for the product

field.name: PROCESSING_MODE
field.description: Identification of the mode of processing

field.name: DISPOSITION_MODE
field.description: Identification of the diposition mode

field.name: RECEIVING_GROUND_STATION
field.description: Acquisition Station Identification

item.description: SOCC (NESDIS Satellite Operations Control Centre), Suitland, Maryland

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_START
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for first Data Item

field.name: RECEIVE_TIME_END
field.description: UTC time of the reception at CDA for last Data Item

field.name: ORBIT_START
field.description: Start Orbit Number, counted incrementally since launch

field.name: ORBIT_END
field.description: Stop Orbit Number

field.name: ACTUAL_PRODUCT_SIZE
field.description: Size of the complete product

field.name: STATE_VECTOR_TIME
field.description: Epoch time (in UTC) of the orbital elements and the orbit state vector. this corresponds to the time of crossing the ascending node for ORBIT_START

field.name: SEMI_MAJOR_AXIS
field.description: Semi major axis of orbit at time of the ascending node crossing.

field.name: ECCENTRICITY
field.description: Orbit eccentricity at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: INCLINATION
field.description: Orbit inclination at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: PERIGEE_ARGUMENT
field.description: Argument of perigee at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: RIGHT_ASCENSION
field.description: Right ascension at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: MEAN_ANOMALY
field.description: Mean anomaly at time of the ascending node crossing

field.name: X_POSITION
field.description: X position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_POSITION
field.description: Y position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_POSITION
field.description: Z position of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: X_VELOCITY
field.description: X velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Y_VELOCITY
field.description: Y velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: Z_VELOCITY
field.description: Z velocity of the orbit state vector in the orbit frame at ascending node

field.name: EARTH_SUN_DISTANCE_RATIO
field.description: Earth-Sun distance ratio - ratio of current Earth-Sun distance to Mean Earth-Sun distance

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_RADIAL
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance radial

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_CROSSTRACK
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance cross-track

field.name: LOCATION_TOLERANCE_ALONGTRACK
field.description: Nadir Earth location tolerance along-track

field.name: YAW_ERROR
field.description: Constant Yaw attitude error

field.name: ROLL_ERROR
field.description: Constant Roll attitude error

field.name: PITCH_ERROR
field.description: Constant Pitch attitude error

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_START
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_START
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at start of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LATITUDE_END
field.description: Latitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: SUBSAT_LONGITUDE_END
field.description: Longitude of sub-satellite point at end of the data set

field.name: LEAP_SECOND
field.description: Occurence of Leap second within the product. Field is set to -1, 0 or +1 dependent upon occurrence of leap second and direction.

field.name: LEAP_SECOND_UTC
field.description: UTC time of occurrence of the Leap Second (If no leap second in the product, value is null)

field.name: TOTAL_RECORDS
field.description: Total count of all records in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MPHR
field.description: Total count of all MPHRs in product (should always be 1!)

field.name: TOTAL_SPHR
field.description: Total count of all SPHRs in product (should be 0 or 1 only)

field.name: TOTAL_IPR
field.description: Total count of all IPRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GEADR
field.description: Total count of all GEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_GIADR
field.description: Total count of all GIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VEADR
field.description: Total count of all VEADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_VIADR
field.description: Total count of all VIADRs in the product

field.name: TOTAL_MDR
field.description: Total count of all MDRs in the product

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to instrument problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR
field.description: Count of MDRs with degradation due to processing problems

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_INST_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded instrument

field.name: COUNT_DEGRADED_PROC_MDR_BLOCKS
field.description: Count of the number of blocks of MDRs degraded due to degraded processing

field.name: DURATION_OF_PRODUCT
field.description: The duration of the product in milliseconds

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_PRESENT
field.description: The total amount of data present in the product

field.name: MILLISECONDS_OF_DATA_MISSING
field.description: The total amount of data missing from the prodcut

field.name: SUBSETTED_PRODUCT
field.description: Set when product has been subsetted (e.g. geographically subsetted using a region of interest filter). Implies the presence of one or more UMARF GIADRs in GAD section for product retrieved from UMARF.

geadr.name: geadr-dk
geadr.description: See Deblooming Kernels Internal File in [AD2]

field.description: Transponders Terrestrial Reference Frame coordinates x, y and z
Transponders Radar Backscattering Cross-section
Transponders Internal Delay
Transponders Nominal Operations Flag

field.name: AC_UTC_TIME
field.description: Ascending node UTC time
State vector at Ascending Node - Position
State vector at Ascending Node - Velocity
Attitude Yaw Steering Law: Amplitude parameters: Cx (pitch), Cy (roll) and Cz (yaw)
Attitude Distortion Law parameters, DIM1 is for 3 different coefficients, DIM3 is for 4 different values per coefficient, DIM2 is for three different attitude angles

viadr.name: viadr-dump
viadr.description: Dump Identification and other dump-related information

field.name: START_ORBIT_DUMP
field.description: Start orbit of the Dump

field.name: STOP_ORBIT_DUMP
field.description: Stop orbit of the Dump

field.name: DUMP_START_TIME
field.description: Start time of the dump

field.name: DUMP_AC_STATION
field.description: Acquisition station of the dump

item.name: SOCC
item.description: SOCC (NESDIS Satellite Operations Control Centre), Suitland, Maryland

field.name: F_UC
field.description: Radar carrier frequency

field.name: P_TX_P
field.description: Nominal radar RF transmit power in pulse

field.name: G_RX
field.description: Nominal receive chain gain setting
Nominal atmospheric loss per unit length
Nominal height of the atmosphere

field.name: T_ORC
field.description: Threshold for Out-Of-Range count

field.name: M_SEG
field.description: Number of noise source packets in a noise segment

field.name: M_BLOCK
field.description: Number of noise segments in a noise block

field.name: N_H_FIL
field.description: Number of samples in the filter which smoothes noise over frequencies
Coefficients of the filter which smoothes noise over frequencies

field.name: S
field.description: Start sample number for noise power estimation

field.name: E
field.description: End sample number for noise power estimation

field.name: N_PG
field.description: Number of power gain values in the along track average
Normalisation factors for internal calibration (set at the start of commissioning)

field.name: T_ON_OFF
field.description: Power gain estimation T on-off

field.name: RX_FIL_ON_OFF
field.description: RX filter shape estimation method switch

field.name: RX_FIL_X
field.description: RX filter shape estimation parameter X

field.name: T_PG
field.description: selectable percentage of synthetic power gain products before along-track averaging

field.name: T_PG_CAL
field.description: selectable percentage of synthetic power gain products before along-track averaging, for calibration source packets

field.name: T_FILTER
field.description: Sselectable percentage of synthetic noise for RX filter shape computation

field.name: T_USABLE
field.description: Threshold for usable sigma0 flag

field.name: T_TIME
field.description: Threshold separation in time between last good and first good filter shapes in case of interruption of measureing sequence by a calibration sequence

field.name: FL_COM_OP
field.description: Commissioning/Operations phase flag (see AD-2 for values)

field.name: FL_CAL
field.description: Calibration good/bad flag (see AD-2 for values)

field.name: FL_DEBLOOM
field.description: Deblooming on/off flag (see AD-2 for values)

field.name: X_ORBIT
field.description: Threshold for characterising the departure of the orbit from a reference orbit

field.name: X_ATTITUDE
field.description: Threshold for characterising the departure of theattitude from a reference attiitude

Hamming Parameter Along Track for 25 km resolution spatial averaging
Hamming Parameter Across Track for 25 km spatial averaging
Hamming Window Length Along Track for 25 km resolution spatial averaging
Hamming Window Length Across Track for 25 km spatial resolution averaging

field.name: D_ALONG_25
field.description: Along Track 25 km resolution node spacing

field.name: D_ACROSS_25
field.description: Across Track 25 km resolution node spacing
Hamming Parameter Along Track for 50 km resolution spatial averaging
Hamming Parameter Across Track for 50 km resolution spatial averaging
Hamming Window Length Along Track for 50 km resolution spatial averaging
Hamming Window Length Across Track for 50 km resolution spatial averaging

field.name: D_ALONG_50
field.description: Along Track 50 km resolution node spacing

field.name: D_ACROSS_50
field.description: Across Track 50 km resolution node spacing

field.name: THETA_LOOK_MID
field.description: Look angle defining position of node number 0 (mid swath)

field.name: DELTA_T_FLN
field.description: Time delay after the first source packet time given to the processor, in order to generate the first node of nodes

field.name: GAP_GAIN_RANGE_PEAK
field.description: Antenna gain range below peak gain to be used when building GAP estimates dataset

field.name: GAP_DELTA_TRANS
field.description: Integration range about the peak of transponder echos
Degree of the polynomial in (1) n (elevation) and (2) m (azimuth)

field.name: AGPO_SCHEDULE
field.description: Codeword related to AGPO parameter refinement schedule (0 for default, as given in [AD2], successive numbers for later changes)

field.name: AGPO_L_M_MAX_STEP
field.description: Maximum number of Steps in each Levenberg-Marquart Iteration
Lambda Parameter in Levelberg-Marquart Iteration: (1) Initial factor, (2) Reduction factor and (3) Increment Factor

field.name: AGPO_ALGO_FLAG
field.description: Flag indicating Linear (=0) or Exponential (=1) Temperature reduction in simulated annealing

field.name: AGPO_SA_CALCYC
field.description: Number of calibration cycles for initalising simulated annealing

field.name: AGPO_SA_TEMP
field.description: Number of temperatures to be used in simulated annealing

field.name: AGPO_SA_CYC
field.description: Number of cycles at each temperature in simulated annealing
Scale factor for thermal fluctuations in simulated annealing
Probability of accepting energy increase in simulated annealing
Value of energy measure set as stopping criterion

field.units: dB for Amplitude and degrees for Phase
field.description: Parameters of the nominal theoretical antena gain pattern used for the Mid Beams, as defined in [AD2] : (1) Amplitude and (2) Phase

field.units: dB for Amplitude and degrees for Phase
field.description: Parameters of the nominal theoretical antena gain pattern used for the Side Beams, as defined in [AD2]: (1) Amplitude and (2) Phase

field.name: AGPO_TRA_REJECT
field.description: Threshold setting for transponder measurement rejection
Time range or time ranges (up to 50) of data to be selected for use in iteration (for each of the 6 antennas)
Set of transponders to be used in AGPO estimation (for each of the 6 antennas)
Set of ascending and/or descending passess to be used in AGPO estimation (for each of the 6 antennas)
Antenna gain range below peak gain to be used in this AGPO run (for each of the 6 antennas)
Flag set to 1 if GAP data is to be edited out of the above selection / set to 0 otherwise
Domain control function parameter for AGPO (theta and phi components)
Domain control function parameter for AGPO (theta and phi components)

field.name: DEB_RADIOUS
field.description: Domain radious of the deblooming kernels
Tx Filter shape function coefficients

field.name: GCM_J_BEGIN
field.description: Start source packet for GCMN averaging

field.name: GCM_J_END
field.description: End source packet for GCMN averaging

field.name: GCM_T_TEST_GCM
field.description: Test threshold for normal GCM

field.name: GCM_T_HIGH
field.description: Overdrive threshold for normal GCM

field.name: GCM_T_LOW
field.description: Low threshold for normal GCM

field.name: GCM_D_MIN
field.description: Minimum drive level for exceptional GCM

field.name: GCM_D_MAX
field.description: Maximum drive level for exceptional GCM
Chirp Rate for the 6 beams, for Measurement Mode
Chirp start frequency words for the 6 beams, for Measurement Mode
Deramp start frequency words for the 6 beams, for Measurement Mode
Chirp Rate for the 6 beams, for Calibration Mode
Chirp start frequency words for the 6 beams, for Calibration Mode
Deramp start frequency words for the 6 beams, for Calibration Mode
Pulse amplitude distortion model: 4 coefficients a(0), a(1), a(2) and a(3) for each one of the 6 beams. The units for a coefficient are 1/msec^i , i = 0,...3.

field.name: N_FIR
field.description: Number of echo windows averaged on-board

field.name: O_ECHO_W
field.description: Overlap of echo window
FIR Beta and g coefficients
Number of range looks for every beam
Range Look Summation alpha and ro weights for every beam
2-dimension flag to denote the FIR-function shape and fractional overlaps. Values (0,0) in this flag denote a triangle shape with 50% overlap of adjacent echoes. This is the default value

field.name: T_RL
field.description: Range Look Duration = z_RAN
Range look fractional overlaps

field.name: V_ADC
field.description: ADC frequency sampling discriminator signal

field.name: V_HIGH
field.description: Highest signal frequency effectively present in the discriminator signal

field.name: N_FFT
field.description: Number of samples in the range look Fast Fourier Transform

field.name: F_CAL
field.description: Calibration Frequency

field.name: F_ICALP
field.description: Frequency of the sample above the calibration frequency

field.name: F_ICALM
field.description: Frequency of the sample below the calibration frequency

field.name: ICALP
field.description: Sample index corresponding to F_ICALP

field.name: ICALM
field.description: Sample index corresponding to F_ICALM
Coupler to coupler loss for each beam and switch path
Instrument characterisation functions
Instrument characterisation functions
Instrument characterisation functions
Transmit Path losses
Receive Path losses

field.name: DELTA_RADAR
field.description: Radar Internal Delay

field.name: F_LO4
field.description: LO4 mixer frequency

field.name: GC_OFFSET
field.description: Gain Compression Offset

mdr.name: mdr-1b-25km
mdr.description: Only used in Level 1B 25 km products

field.name: UTC_LINE_NODES
field.description: UTC time of line of 25 km nodes

field.name: SAT_TRACK_AZI
field.description: Azimuth angle bearing of nadir track velocity

25 km node number as used in the PGF (ref AD-2]), i.e., (20 to -20) for the left swath in the left-to-right order, (-20 to 20) for the right swath in the left-to-right order, 0 corresponding to the mid swath position in both swaths.
Swath (right or left)
Latitude (-90 to 90 deg)
Longitude (0 to 360 deg)
Height of atmowphere used
Atmospheric loss per unit length of atmosphere
Smoothed to 25 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) sigma zero values
Smoothed to 25 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) kp values (values between 0 and 1)
Smoothed to 25 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) incidence angle values
Smoothed to 25 km spatial resolution triplet (fore, mid, aft) azimuth angle values
Flag related to the quality of the Kp estimate (ref. Ad-2)
Flag related to the usability of the averaged value (ref. Ad-2)
Flag related to the use of synthetic data in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the quality of the used of synthetic data in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to orbit/atticute quality in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to solar array reflection contamination in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to telemtry quality in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the presence of extrapolated reference functions in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
Flag related to the use of measurements over land in the generation of averaged value (ref. Ad-2) (value between 0 and 1)
